verbs.description: [ARGM-LOC: In a speech to the National Peace Officers’ Memorial Service] , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: called] [ARG1: for an end to attacks on police] , [ARGM-ADV: adding that ambush attacks are “ one of the most alarming crimes ” against police] .

In a speech to the National Peace Officers’ Memorial Service , [ARG0: President Donald Trump] called for an end to attacks on police , [V: adding] [ARG1: that ambush attacks are “ one of the most alarming crimes ” against police] .

In a speech to the National Peace Officers’ Memorial Service , President Donald Trump called for an end to attacks on police , adding that [ARG1: ambush attacks] [V: are] [ARG2: “ one of the most alarming crimes ” against police] .
